Developers

Tristan
- Original author.

Jerome "KingGuppy" Fisher
- Adapted to work with the new mt32emu link library.

JÃ¶rg Walter

Sergey V. Mikayev
- Modifications towards compatibility with the new mt32emu link library API (since ver. 1.0.0 of libmt32emu).
- Finetuned for better MIDI timing accuracy when used with ALSA-Pulse configurations.
- Improved handling of ALSA MIDI events: added support for 14-bit controllers, RPNs and fragmented SysExes.
